content:
Yes! Pok Pok has several dishes that are quite spicy, and they even have a "spice guide" on their menu that indicates the level of spiciness for each dish so you can choose according to your taste. Here are a few dishes that are on the spicier side:

1. Papaya Pok Pok - This salad has a nice kick of spice from the chili peppers and garlic.

2. Khao Soi - This curry noodle soup has a moderate level of spiciness, but you can request it to be spicy if you like.

3. Kung Op Wun Sen - This is a dish of prawns and glass noodles baked with garlic, pepper, and cilantro, and it can be quite spicy.

4. Yam Makheua Yao - This salad made with grilled eggplant, chili, and garlic has a nice level of spice that adds a kick to the sweet and sour flavors.

5. Gai Yang - This is a grilled chicken dish marinated in a turmeric and coriander paste, served with a spicy chili dipping sauce.

If you love spicy food, you'll definitely find something on the Pok Pok menu that suits your taste.
